description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共保定市委第二书记、保定市人民政府市长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Second Secretary of the Baoding Municipal Committee of the CCP and Mayor of the Baoding Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国旧省级行政区，石双琪的出生地所属省份。
description.en: A former province-level administrative division of China, where Shi Shuangqi's birthplace was located.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区，由旧直隶省改称而来。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, formerly known as Zhili Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，是石双琪的出生地。
description.en: A county in Hebei Province, China, and the birthplace of Shi Shuangqi.

description.zh-cn: 石双琪为该国政治人物。
description.en: Shi Shuangqi was a political figure in this country.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在保定市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Baoding City.

description.zh-cn: 保定市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Baoding City.

description.zh-cn: 1937年至1945年间中华人民共和国与大日本帝国之间爆发的战争，石双琪在此期间参加了抗日自卫队。
description.en: The war between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from 1937 to 1945, during which Shi Shuangqi joined the anti-Japanese self-defense force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在唐县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Tang County.

description.zh-cn: 顺平县的旧称，石双琪曾在此地任县委书记。
description.en: The former name of Shunping County, where Shi Shuangqi once served as the County Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，旧称完县。
description.en: A county in Hebei Province, China, formerly known as Wan County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在完县（今顺平县）的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Wan County (present-day Shunping County).

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战，石双琪曾率民兵团支援前线参与此战争。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China, in which Shi Shuangqi participated by leading a militia regiment to support the front lines.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在涞源县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Laiyuan County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在保定地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Baoding Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 高碑店市的前身，石双琪曾在此地任县委书记。
description.en: The predecessor of Gaobeidian City, where Shi Shuangqi once served as the County Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，由新城县发展而来。
description.en: A city in Hebei Province, China, which evolved from Xincheng County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在新城县（今高碑店市）的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Xincheng County (present-day Gaobeidian City).

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，石双琪曾在此地任县委第二书记。
description.en: A county in Hebei Province, China, where Shi Shuangqi served as the Second County Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在涿县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Zhuo County.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，石双琪曾在此地任县委第一书记。
description.en: A county in Hebei Province, China, where Shi Shuangqi served as the First County Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在易县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Yi County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在毕节地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Bijie Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国境内的一场政治运动，期间石双琪受到迫害。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Shi Shuangqi was persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在贵阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Guiyang City.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间贵阳市的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of Guiyang City during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省，石双琪曾在此地担任市长并最终逝世。
description.en: A city in Hebei Province, China, where Shi Shuangqi served as mayor and eventually passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，石双琪的前任，曾任保定市革命委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, predecessor of Shi Shuangqi, who served as the Director of the Baoding Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替石双琪担任保定市人民政府市长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Shi Shuangqi as Mayor of the Baoding Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间保定市的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of Baoding City during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 石双琪是河北唐县人。
description.en: Shi Shuangqi was a native of Tang County, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，石双琪参加了本村的抗日自卫队，开始其政治军事生涯。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Anti-Japanese War, Shi Shuangqi joined his village's anti-Japanese self-defense force, beginning his political and military career.

description.zh-cn: 石双琪于1940年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Shi Shuangqi joined the Communist Party of China in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，石双琪任中共唐县县委组织部部长。
description.en: In 1945, Shi Shuangqi served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Tang County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，石双琪任完县县委书记。
description.en: In 1945, Shi Shuangqi served as the Party Secretary of Wan County.

description.zh-cn: 1947年夏，石双琪率民兵团支援前线，参加第二次国共内战。
description.en: In the summer of 1947, Shi Shuangqi led a militia regiment to support the front lines, participating in the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年至1964年期间，石双琪历任中共涞源县委书记等职。他在任期间组织群众找矿，促进了山区致富，使涞源县获评为全省模范县。
description.en: Between 1950 and 1964, Shi Shuangqi served successively as Secretary of the CCP Laiyuan County Committee. During his tenure, he organized the masses to prospect for minerals, promoting wealth in the mountainous areas and leading Laiyuan County to be named a model county in the province.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年至1964年期间，石双琪历任中共保定地委组织部部长等职。
description.en: Between 1950 and 1964, Shi Shuangqi served successively as Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Baoding Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年至1964年期间，石双琪历任中共新城县委书记等职。
description.en: Between 1950 and 1964, Shi Shuangqi served successively as Secretary of the CCP Xincheng County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年至1964年期间，石双琪历任中共涿县县委第二书记等职。
description.en: Between 1950 and 1964, Shi Shuangqi served successively as Second Secretary of the CCP Zhuo County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年至1964年期间，石双琪历任中共易县县委第一书记等职。1963年当地发生特大洪灾，他率干部赴重灾区组织救灾。
description.en: Between 1950 and 1964, Shi Shuangqi served successively as First Secretary of the CCP Yi County Committee. In 1963, when a major flood occurred, he led cadres to organize disaster relief in the severely affected areas.

description.zh-cn: 1965年，石双琪调任中共毕节地委副书记。
description.en: In 1965, Shi Shuangqi was transferred to serve as Deputy Secretary of the CCP Bijie Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，石双琪受到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Shi Shuangqi was persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 1977年，石双琪调任中共贵阳市委书记。
description.en: In 1977, Shi Shuangqi was transferred to serve as Secretary of the CCP Guiyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1977年，石双琪兼任贵阳市革命委员会副主任。
description.en: In 1977, Shi Shuangqi also served concurrently as Deputy Director of the Guiyang Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，石双琪调任中共保定市委第二书记。
description.en: In 1980, Shi Shuangqi was transferred to serve as Second Secretary of the CCP Baoding Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1982年7月，石双琪出任保定市人民政府市长。
description.en: In July 1982, Shi Shuangqi was appointed Mayor of the Baoding Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 石双琪接替刘兆亮（时任保定市革命委员会主任）的职位，出任新设立的保定市人民政府市长。
description.en: Shi Shuangqi succeeded Liu Zhaoliang (then Director of the Baoding Municipal Revolutionary Committee) to become the mayor of the newly established Baoding Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 石双琪的保定市人民政府市长职务由田福庭接替。
description.en: Shi Shuangqi's position as Mayor of the Baoding Municipal People's Government was succeeded by Tian Futing.

description.zh-cn: 刘兆亮是石双琪的前任，担任保定市革命委员会主任。
description.en: Liu Zhaoliang was Shi Shuangqi's predecessor, serving as the Director of the Baoding Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 完县是顺平县的旧称。
description.en: Wan County is the former name of Shunping County.

description.zh-cn: 新城县是高碑店市的前身。
description.en: Xincheng County is the predecessor of Gaobeidian City.
